t: r/fireTV on Reddit: I'm seeing Amazon branded Fire TVs. Who makes them?
Amazon makes its own TVs now, and one responds to 'Alexa' hands-free - CNET
s: September 10, 2021 - The Amazon Fire TV Omni and Fire TV 4-Series are the first Amazon-built TVs, according to the company. Preorders start today; they're slated to arrive in October. The Fire TV Omni's claim to fame is a built-in far-field mic array that responds to the "Alexa" wake word, much like an Echo speaker.

t: Amazon Making Its Own Fire TVs | 4-Series & Omni Series - Consumer Reports
s: Many have been fine overall performers for the money, but none have done a very effective job presenting HDR, a big differentiator among TVs this year. t: Amazon updates the Fire TV lineup with new QLED sizes, a $200 smart TV, and availability in new countries
s: March 22, 2023 - The Omni QLED Series can also turn your TV into an in-home art gallery. The Ambient Experience features a growing collection of more than 1,700 free gallery-quality pieces of artwork—no monthly subscription required. t: Amazon creates own branded TV
s: September 7, 2021 - An Amazon-branded TV could launch in the United States as early as October. The parcels to showbiz company has already launched an AmazonBasics TV in India and has partnered with other manufacturers to include its FireTV software.
